snippet: Thousands of Muslims protected by Chadian soldiers fled the capital, Bangui, in a mass exodus on Friday.
abstract: Thousands of Muslims protected by Chadian soldiers flee Central African Republic capital Bangui in a mass exodus; flight follows months of attacks by Christian militias on anyone perceived as supporting the former government led by Muslim rebels.
lead_paragraph: Thousands of Muslims protected by Chadian soldiers fled the capital, Bangui, in a mass exodus on Friday.

keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
keywords.name: subject
